success: We will be the reason of your company's success

games.different: We are different, No usual way

about.content1: GA corporation located in Manila founded in 2015, is a license holder of PAGCOR and is supervised by PAGCOR
about.content2: The company has gathered a large number of experienced game designer and engineer at domestic and overseas, and mission to become a well-known brand in the industry.
about.content3: The company has rich experience of successful cooperation with many companies, and has been creating a lot of benefits for them.
